projectGridLines.title: Title: Intern - Digital
projectGridLines.description:
Description: 

Build analytics products/accelerators using a variety of big data technologies and analytics tools as required by stakeholders and create robust documentation of solutions, underlying design decisions and operating procedures  


? Work on several large-scale datasets (e.g. internal client data, external public data, and new sources of data) and drive analytics path to align with overall project objective, develop and execute analytical module development on PwCâ€™s big data platform  


? Engage well with both internal and external stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them to analytical solutions  


? Required to meet tight deadlines and manage multiple competing priorities; ability to work independently and navigate through ambiguous requirements  


? Manage the continuous improvement of data science and machine learning by following industry best practices  


? Stay abreast of new AI research from leading digital by reading papers and experimenting with code.  


? Work in sprint cycles to develop proof-of-concepts and prototype models that can be demoed and explained to data scientists, internal stakeholders, and clients.  


? Understand and implement ETL pipelines, data ingestion & transformation to populate data models.  


? Communicate with clarity, ask relevant questions, drive conversations  


? Come up with better and new perspective to different analytical solution
